title: Axiom Constraint Validation Domain (ACVD) Schema
description: Defines the externalized constraints governing P-01 calculus and DSE parameters, guaranteeing deterministic configuration baseline for GSEP-C (S01). Implements strict data structure enforcement.

ACVD_VERSION.description: Semantic versioning of the ACVD schema payload.

POLICY_METADATA.description: Descriptive and administrative metadata for traceability and deployment control.

POLICY_ID.description: Unique identifier for this specific ACVD configuration set (e.g., 'ACVD-PROD-V94').

CREATION_DATE.description: Timestamp indicating when the policy configuration was finalized.

IS_MANDATORY_BASELINE.description: If TRUE, this policy cannot be overridden by dynamic environment variables or local flags.

P01_CRITERIA.description: Constraints directly dictating the P-01 PASS resolution (Section 3.0). All nested parameters are mandatory for explicit state definition.

AXIOM_I_UTILITY.description: Defines constraints for system efficacy (TEMM) and utility debt.

MIN_EFFICACY_THRESHOLD_OMEGA.description: The configured minimum TEMM score (Î©_min) required for P-01 PASS (0.0 < x < 1.0).

MAX_ALLOWABLE_UTILITY_DEBT_LOGS.description: Maximum number of ADTM logs permissible within a cycle before Integrity Halt (IH).

AXIOM_II_CONTEXT.description: Defines constraints related to temporal context resolution.

ECVM_VALIDATION_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Maximum time allowed (in milliseconds) for ECVM state resolution before IH.

AXIOM_III_INTEGRITY.description: Defines constraints focused on core operational integrity (MPAM).

ALLOW_ZERO_MPAM_VIOLATIONS.description: If TRUE, any resulting MPAM entry triggers an automatic P-01 FAIL, enforcing zero-tolerance governance.

GSEP_BEHAVIOR.description: Operational constraints for the GSEP-C execution and failure protocols.

IH_IMMEDIATE_ROLLBACK_REQUIRED.description: If TRUE, Integrity Halt (IH) triggers mandatory Rollback Protocol (RRP) instantly.

IH_MAX_ATTEMPTS_BEFORE_FREEZE.description: Maximum number of RRP attempts before the system enters a hard freeze/manual inspection state.
